I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
A = fix A (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 _ _ _ => A m0 k x | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x0 x then y0 else A m0 k x else A m0 k x end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
cA = fix cA (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x z then y else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z then cA m0 k x else cA m0 k z else cA m0 k z end with cA_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA_1 m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec
bottom = fix bottom (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else bottom m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec y (bottom m0 k0 z) then bottom m0 k0 x else bottom m0 k0 z else bottom m0 k z end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart
succ_dec : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), {succ m k x} + {~ succ m k x}
Inductive dim : Set := zero : dim | one : dim
dart = nat : Set

exd_A_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m (A m k z) -> exd m z

succ_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> exd m z
pred_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> pred m k z -> exd m z
exd_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (cA m k z)
exd_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (cA_1 m k z)
top = fix top (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else top m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x (top m0 k0 z) then top m0 k0 y else top m0 k0 z else top m0 k z end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart
cA_1_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> cA_1 m k z <> nil -> exd m z
A_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> A m k x = y -> cA m k x = y
exd_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), exd m z < -> exd (B m k x) z

```  
intros m k z Hmap.
unfold cA.
unfold succ_dec.
destruct (succ_dec m k z).
- apply A_cA with z.
  assumption.
  apply cA_exd.
  assumption.
  assumption.
  rewrite A_A_1.
  reflexivity.
  assumption.
- apply cA_bottom.
  assumption.
  apply cA_exd.
  assumption.
  assumption.
  assumption.
Qed.
```

original: intros m k z Hmap. unfold cA. unfold succ_dec. destruct (succ_dec m k z). - apply A_cA with z. auto. apply cA_exd. auto. auto. rewrite A_A_1. reflexivity. auto. - apply cA_bottom. auto. apply cA_exd. auto. auto. auto.
